properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 19.
1. DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED FROM VESSEL GUDRUN
   IN 53-36.78N 025-13.62W AT 180920Z AUG.
   TWO PERSONS ABANDONED SHIP IN LIFERAFT.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
   PHONE: 44 344 382 0025,
   E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2049/22.
